translations: 将……做成木乃伊；使干瘪；弄干保存

sentences.sentence: Channel 4 looks set to become embroiled in another taste row after backing a project which seeks to mummify a terminally-ill volunteer for a TV documentary.
sentences.translation: CHANNEL 4寻找临终志愿者死后在电视纪录片中成为木乃伊。CHANNEL4正支持一个寻找临终志愿者在电视纪录片中成为木乃伊的项目，看起来这个频道打算换个口味了。
